price: A ko govori ljepše od onoga koji poziva Allahu, koji dobra djela čini i koji govori: "Ja sam, doista, musliman!"
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡلٗا مِّمَّن دَعَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا وَقَالَ إِنَّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: waman aḥsanu qawlan mimman daʿā ilā al-lahi waʿamila ṣāliḥan waqāla innanī mina al-mus'limīna
